Pre-Game Insights: India goes into this match with a 5-0 advantage over Pakistan in Cricket World T20 competitions.
The most fascinating aspect is that this is the first T20 game, that the two will feature in the same game.
Hasan Ali (PAK) and Jasprit Bumrah (IND) can have a major contribution for their respective sides in the pace department.
Imad Wasim (PAK) and Ravindra Jadeja (IND) are effective utility all-rounders and a good match-up for the high voltage 2021 Cricket World T20 game.
